content: निर्माल्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Pure, clean, stainless. --ल्यं {@--1@} Purity, clearness, stainlessness. {@--2@} The remains of an offering to a deity, such as flowers; निर्माल्योज्झितपुष्पदामनिकरे का षट्पदानां रतिः <ls>Ś. Til. 10.</ls> {@--3@} Flowers used and cast off, faded or withered flowers; निर्माल्यरैथ ननृतेऽवधीरितानां <ls>Śi. 8. 60.</ls> {@--4@} Remains in general.
